Definition: Wholesale and retail trade includes repair of motor vehicles, motorcycles and personal and household goods, sale, maintenance and repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles; retail sale of automotive fuel, wholesale trade and commission trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles, retail trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles; repair of personal and household goods. Hotels and restaurants includes both accomodation and food services. The data are in Current Prices in Local Currency.
Indicators: Real GVA growth: wholesale, retail trade and hotels
